markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" />Interact ([auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16)) **Frequency** once per minute;   **Effect** You play a few notes on the busine. Evil creatures within 60 feet who hear the notes must succeed at a DC 34 Will save or be [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) for 1 round, or 2 rounds on a critical failure; this is an [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93) effect.
name: Interact (auditory)
